welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Griffin, a charming city known for its southern hospitality and rich history. We invite you to explore and discover all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Atlanta Speedway Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Atlanta Speedway Airport, handling all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport serves all international flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at College Park Airport serves as the hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at College Park Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
